title: (x) Looking for the script font Shelman {Mike Y}
content:
Anyone ever hear of a font called Shelman?

Know where I can buy it?

Sample attached.

THANKS!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [shelman.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/typophile.com/files/shelman.jpg) | 104.85 KB |
author: sullivanj

comments.content: Haven't heard of Shelman, but you might like [Impress](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=BT.122206.0.0), [Brody](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=UR.115357.0.0), [Amber](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=UR.123600.0.0), [Arab Brushstroke](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=UR.115120.0.0), [Polka](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=SG.102075.0.0), [Challenge](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=EF.101007.0.0), [Dom Casual](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=LH.120844.0.0), or [Okay](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805144154/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=UR.116224.0.0).

'Shelman' was in the Expresiv Fonts Brush Script Collection that was sold by Tiger Direct in the mid-90's. That is the font used for your lettering, as I have the collection. Of course it doesn't have any of the 3-D shading, but the letterforms match.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks guys!

I have that Expresiv collection too Mike!

Did not have it to search for here at work.

Thanks for helping me match this one, as always.
